title: How can I reduce water consumption in my garden?
description: I have a large garden and I'm looking for ways to reduce water usage while still maintaining healthy plants. Any tips or techniques would be appreciated.

title: What are the best water-saving devices for home use?
description: I want to make my home more water-efficient. What are some of the most effective water-saving devices I can install in my kitchen and bathroom?

title: How to harvest rainwater for household use?
description: I'm interested in setting up a rainwater harvesting system for my home. What are the basic components I need, and are there any regulations I should be aware of?
